mapper.select: SELECT num, title, nickname, visit_count AS visitCount, file_id AS fileId FROM post WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%') AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nickname},'%') AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%') ORDER BY num desc limit 10 offset #{page}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%') AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nickname},'%') AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')

SELECT num, id, nickname, title, content, province, city, district, file_id AS fileId, file_name AS fileName, postdate, update_date AS updateDate, visit_count AS visitCount FROM post WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (id, nickname, title, content, province, city, district, file_id, file_name) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{fileId}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET visit_count = (visit_count + 1) WHERE num = #{num}
